title: 101 Beaumount Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Tree suffered large branch failure, decay in remaining stem, presence of multiple fruiting bodies on trunk flare and old branch union, has very extensive decay overall and a cavity in main stem; cannot be replaced due to narrow sidewalk and nearby landscape area's proximity to property

title: 880 El Camino Del Mar
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787966); three trees are infected with Arbutus Canker which has caused large portions of the trunk to decay and crack, the fungal infection is starting to affect the canopies of the trees, unfortunately there is no treatment to stop the infection; property owner to replace with two magnolias for better spacing, also working with applicant on options for more replacements or adding more permeable sidewalk

title: 1909 Broderick Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788012); proposed removal for driveway rerouting, construction would require removal of much healthier street tree, attempted topiary on this Pittosporum, structure is poor due to lions tailing, canopy has been systematically reduced, decay in branches, cannot be replaced, property owner to pay appraised in lieu fee of $2,700

title: 1020 Baker Street
Reason(s) for removal: Tree was planted without a permit as a multistemmed shrub, was planted on top of communication and gas lines, root pruning required for repairs to sidewalk, adjacent wall and walkway are unsustainable, mature size will continue to outgrow space; not replaceable due to utility conflicts and space restrictions

title: 2033 Baker Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788133); arbutus has fungal symptoms of canker cracking cray patches on trunk and thin canopy, disease is not fault of owner, it is new and attacking Arbutus across the Bay Area; owner wishes to replace with full canopy tree as soon as possible, basin can be expanded to shift tree away from gas lines

title: 1245 Jones Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787987); fruiting bodies, indicating decay at base of the tree, roots have been cut on the opposite side of the lean; will be replaced

title: 576 Union Street
Reason(s) for removal: Has suffered transplant shock and main trunk has died; will be replaced

title: 1852 Fell Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788012); condition is good, despite some evidence of root decay, primary concern is site constraints on trunk and canopy, base of trunk pressing against neighboring staircase; cannot be replaced in exact location, but possibility if small stature replacement to the east in the set back

title: 966 Dolores Street
Reason(s) for removal: Significant pocket of decay inside lower portion of trunk extending vertically below ground and up into trunk, visible pocket of decay is at least 1 cubic yard, catastrophic failure is imminent within decade; will be replanted

title: 1666 Wallace Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Significant dry rot in trunk and canopy; may be replaced pending underground utilities check
